data.text: to swing backward and forward like a pendulum
examples: … he oscillates regularly between his comfortable home … and his downtown office-laboratory …
The mood of the voters has oscillated between optimism and pessimism.
Bank rate oscillates between 2 and 6 percent.

data.text: to move or travel back and forth between two points
examples: … he oscillates regularly between his comfortable home … and his downtown office-laboratory …
The mood of the voters has oscillated between optimism and pessimism.
Bank rate oscillates between 2 and 6 percent.

data.text: to vary between opposing beliefs, feelings, or theories
examples: … he oscillates regularly between his comfortable home … and his downtown office-laboratory …
The mood of the voters has oscillated between optimism and pessimism.
Bank rate oscillates between 2 and 6 percent.
